name: GeoEdge Ad Security
author: Geoedge

sections.description:
GeoEdge Ad Security protects publishers’ audience from malicious and bad ads in the programmatic ecosystem and ensures a clean, safe and engaging user experience. GeoEdge Ad Security monitors your ad inventory 27/4 to detect and block any malicious activity and quality issues in real-time, long before any damage can occur. Only clean ads are served, and your users are never exposed to security or advertising quality threats (such as auto-redirects, malware, offensive ads, malvertising, bad ads, etc.)

With GeoEdge Ad Security you can increase revenue by keeping users on-site, engaged and loyal over time.

User security, ad quality & compliance begin with GeoEdge Ad Security. To ensure the ad experience and security of your users, GeoEdge Ad Security monitors every single ad impression. Only impressions with malicious or bad ads, like auto-redirects, malware, phishing are blocked, keeping your precious ad revenue stream flow.
sections.installation:
In order to use the GeoEdge Ad Security plugin, you need to work with Google Ad Manager (former DFP) or have Google Publisher Tag on your site.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/geoedge-ad-security` directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)

Note: The GeoEdge plugin relies on the Geoedge third party software as a service solution for all functionality of the software. You can find more information on Geoedge software as a service here: https://geoedge.com, and in its terms and conditions of use: https://www.geoedge.com/terms
sections.faq:
Is the free version really free?

Yes, GeoEdge is happy to provide a free version of its real-time blocking solution without any credit card information necessary. We feel passionately about the user experience and are dedicated to help clean up the digital advertising ecosystem. GeoEdge is proud to help smaller publishers or those with a limited budget.

How much ad impression do I get with the free version?

Up to 20M impressions per month

Why are you asking about Google Ad Manager

At the moment, the GeoEdge Ad Security only supports WordPress websites with Google Publisher Tags, or sites that works with Google Ad Manager (former DFP).

How does it works

GeoEdge Ad Security monitors your ads 24/7 and prevents malicious ads, redirects and offensive ads from impact on visitors and helps you increase your revenue by keeping users on-site, engaged and loyal over time.
